creator: markus.lind@yellowmap.de
text:
It seems that the xml output of the balancer manager is not working as the html version and has some other issues

1.) http://server/balancer-manager?xml=1 gives the html output if parameter nonce is not provided

2.) http://server/balancer-manager?xml=1&nonce=.... gives an xml output, but only scheme, hostname and load factor values of a worker. The other fields of the html version (load factor, status etc.) are not provided. 
In addition hostname only shows the ip address and not ip:port if a port is configured

3.) Putting a <nonce> node in the xml would be nice

Created attachment 25504
enhanced xml balancer interface

mod_proxy_balancer.c patch against httpd-2.2.15

fixes issues 2 and 3 by adding all fields to the xml output
creator: markus.lind@yellowmap.de
